summary:
This is a standalone PentagramAmulet (Male and Female).
Version 4: Amulet is now enchantable

Replacer also available
descriptionHtml:
PentagramAmulet / Drudenfuss

At first, i\'m sorry about my misleading information, in Version 3 the amulet was
NOT entchantable (it shows up in the enchanting menu, but it doesn\'t attain the effect).
Version 4 should work fine now (except in menus the amulet shows up like a gold necklace now,
InGame it shows up correct). (Thanks to LillithSuccubus for pointing at the problem).
If there should be any other problems, please give a response.

This is a Amulet (standalone) which uses the mesh and texture of the ZenitharAmulet.
Texture is edited by me.

Version 4:

The unechanted Amulet is called Drudenfuss and can be forged (Jewelry costs 1 EbonyIngot) 
and is enchantable (now it works).

The enchanted Amulet has the same Enchantment like GauldurAmulet. It also can be forged 
and costs 10 EbonyIngots.

The new Version has only one .esp, so you can choose which amulet to forge.

Manual Install:

extract .7z archive in your data folder located in your Skyrim main folder

OR (recommended):

install it with download manager or nmm


There\'s also a ReplacerVersion (It will replace the GauldurAmulet) but,

Attention:

maybe this will overwrite meshes located in folder

DATA\\MESHES\\ARMOR\\AMULETSANDRINGS\\ANCIENTNORD

so make a back up copy.

Use at your own risk.

My other Mods:

Dark Brotherhood Amulet: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7204
Draugrs NoGlowingEyes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6062
author: Wast1980
